scenario_text.value:
(The fog is getting thicker?! Damn, we don’t
have much time left...)

You can’t just run off on your own! It’s too
risky around here!

But I figured out where the voices were
coming from! Over there!

There’s a bunch of them there...and Patamon’s
leading them! Who knew this many were left?!
This is bad! We’ve gotta save them!

We can’t spend too much time here. You get
that, right?

Sure. None of this matters if the fog gets to
us.

(The only reason I survived being swallowed
up by the fog was because Miyuki was there.)

(Now that she’s on the enemy’s side... There
won’t be a second miracle like that.)

I want to save as many lives as I can!
So come on, Takuma!

I hear you. We’ll smack these guys around and
save the others!
